languages.text: "Еще мы помним иной день. Мы очнулись в корабле. Жили в его системах. Потом пытались выйти вовне. В сервиторов — таких, как этот. А потом так много наших вместилищ собрали вместе..."

traits.locale_text: "Мы очнулись в корабле. Жили в его системах. Потом пытались выйти вовне. В сервиторов — таких, как этот. А потом так много наших вместилищ собрали вместе..."

languages.text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
languages.original_text: "Еще мы помним иной день. Мы очнулись в корабле. Жили в его системах. Потом пытались выйти вовне. В сервиторов — таких, как этот. А потом так много наших вместилищ собрали вместе..."

traits.locale_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
"We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
"We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
"We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
"We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."
"We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

languages.text: « Nous nous souvenons d'un autre jour, celui où nous nous sommes éveillés à l'intérieur du vaisseau. Nous vivions dans ses systèmes, puis nous avons tenté d'en sortir dans des servitors comme celui-ci... Tant de nos réceptacles étaient rassemblés au même endroit. »
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous souvenons d'un autre jour, celui où nous nous sommes éveillés à l'intérieur du vaisseau. Nous vivions dans ses systèmes, puis nous avons tenté d'en sortir dans des servitors comme celui-ci... Tant de nos réceptacles étaient rassemblés au même endroit. »

languages.text: “我们记得某一天，我们在船上醒来。我们寄宿在它的系统中。然后我们试着走出来，融入到与现在一样的机仆里。那时，我们的许多容器聚集在一处。”
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: “我们记得某一天，我们在船上醒来。我们寄宿在它的系统中。然后我们试着走出来，融入到与现在一样的奴工里。那时，我们的许多容器聚集在一处。”

languages.text: "Wir erinnern uns an einen anderen Tag. Wir sind im Schiff erwacht. Wir haben in seinen Systemen gelebt. Dann haben wir versucht, hinauszukommen. In Servitoren wie diesen. Dann waren so viele unserer Behältnisse an einem Ort versammelt."
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: "Wir erinnern uns an einen anderen Tag. Wir sind im Schiff erwacht. Wir haben in seinen Systemen gelebt. Dann haben wir versucht, hinauszukommen. In Servitoren wie diesen. Dann waren so viele unserer Behältnisse an einem Ort versammelt."

languages.text: «Recordamos otro día. Despertamos dentro de la nave. Vivimos en sus sistemas. Luego intentamos resurgir. Convirtiéndonos en servidores como este. Luego reunieron muchos de nuestros receptáculos en un mismo sitio».
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: «Recordamos otro día. Despertamos dentro de la nave. Vivimos en sus sistemas. Luego intentamos resurgir. Convirtiéndonos en servidores como este. Luego reunieron muchos de nuestros receptáculos en un mismo sitio».

languages.text: 「私たちは別の日のことも覚えている。私たちは船の中で目覚めた。船のシステムの中で生きていた。そして、実体化しようとした。このようなサーヴィターの中に。それから、私たちの器の多くが一ヶ所に集められた」
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは別の日のことも覚えている。私たちは船の中で目覚めた。船のシステムの中で生きていた。そして、実体化しようとした。このようなサーヴィターの中に。それから、私たちの器の多くが一ヶ所に集められた」

languages.text: "Bir gün daha hatırlıyoruz. Geminin içinde uyandık, onun sistemlerinde yaşadık. Sonra ortaya çıkmaya çalıştık. Bunun gibi hizmetörlerin içine girdik. Pek çok muhafaza, tek bir yerde toplandı."
languages.original_text: "We remember another day. We awakened inside the ship. We lived in its systems. Then we tried to emerge. Into servitors like this one. Then so many of our receptacles were gathered in one place."

traits.locale_text: "Bir gün daha hatırlıyoruz. Geminin içinde uyandık, onun sistemlerinde yaşadık. Sonra ortaya çıkmaya çalıştık. Bunun gibi servitörlerin içine girdik. Sonra muhafazamız gibi pek çoğu bir yerde toplandı."
